title: boodeuk
author: boodeuk
content: The decentralized finance startup Firepot Finance is launching its HOTT utility token through an initial DEX offering (IDO) on the KingdomStarter launchpad. The IDO will allow early supporters to purchase HOTT tokens and participate in the Firepot ecosystem. The total token supply is 1 billion, with an initial market cap of $700,000. Firepot aims to bring AI and easy accessibility to DeFi, offering products like lending, staking, yield farming and more. The IDO represents an exciting opportunity for the DeFi community to get involved with this promising new project early on. However, as with any cryptocurrency investment, there are risks involved. Do your own research before participating.Token Details:Ticker: HOTTBlockchain: Arbitrum OneTotal Supply: 1,000,000,000 HOTTIDO Price: $0.005 per HOTTRaise Target: $100,000IDO Schedule:Staking Deadline: August 27th, 9AM UTCCommit Period: August 28th 5AM UTC - August 30th 11PM UTCPost-IDO:Listing: September 8thClaiming: TBAVesting: 15% at TGE, remaining monthly vesting over 6 monthsFirepot Finance aims to make DeFi more accessible through AI-powered products like lending, staking, yield farming and more. The IDO is a chance to get in early on this promising project. Do your own research before participating.
